notes.content:
As we live in Canada, and are renting this camper van, we unfortunately do not know the registration or plate  number.


  I have also included my sister-in-laws  Australian telephone number under \"phone number\", as our Canadian numbers will not be valid in Australia.   
 Looking forward to our stay with you!

Good afternoon, my daughter and I will be using our friends other tent and equipment and would love to be situated close to them please. Their booking will be under the name Marie De Pablo. Thanks so much and we just can not wait for our stay :smiley:

Camping on a tent, travelling with trailer for our equipment. We\'re booking with our friend Jill Buchanan and her daughter, so please we need to stay next to eachother in the site. She has her own car. Thanks
